title: 10: Hygiene in the shed? Let the cows tell you! Scoring system

tasks.task: Scoring system for shed hygiene in dairy cows
subtasks: Inspect udder and hindquarters for dirtiness
Assign score (0, 1, or 2) based on dirtiness extent

tasks.task: Identify hygiene issues based on scoring results
subtasks: Detect problems in passageways or drainage
Check for tail and flank dirt due to diarrhea
Investigate potential dietary causes of dirtiness
Assess overall shed conditions for overcrowding or manure buildup

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Scoring system for shed hygiene in dairy cows
Identify hygiene issues based on scoring results
